net.sf.appia.protocols.total.hybrid
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.appia.protocols.total.hybrid.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

Stores information about the group. For example the current view and if the members are active or passive.
